src_original: iha maitreya pratibhānaṃ satyôpasaṃhitaṃ bhavati /  nâsatyôpasaṃhitaṃ dharmôpasaṃhitaṃ bhavati na  adharmôpasaṃhitaṃ /  kleśahāyakaṃ bhavati na kleśavivarddhakaṃ /
ebhiś caturbhiḥ peyālaṃ /  yasya kasyacin maitreyâibhiś caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ
buddhasaṃjñôtpādayitavyā śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā /  sa dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /
yat kiñcin maitreya subhāṣitaṃ sarvaṃ tad buddhabhāṣitaṃ /
